data.eml:eml: Diversity of marine bryozoans inhabiting demosponges in northeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Almeida, Ana C. S., Souza, Facelucia B. C., Menegola, Carla, Vieira, Leandro M. (2017): Diversity of marine bryozoans inhabiting demosponges in northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4290 (2): 281-323, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4290.2.3
